  • Konstruktordetails

    • Treatment

      public Treatment(long pid, LocalDate date, LocalTime begin, LocalTime end, String description, String remarks, long nid, String status, LocalDate deletionDate, LocalDate archiveDate, String changedBy, String deletedBy)
      Constructor to initiate an object of class Treatment with the given parameter. Use this constructor to initiate objects, which are not persisted yet, because it will not have a treatment id (tid).
      Parameter:
      pid - Id of the treated patient.
      date - Date of the Treatment.
      begin - Time of the start of the treatment in format "hh:MM"
      end - Time of the end of the treatment in format "hh:MM".
      description - Description of the treatment.
      remarks - Remarks to the treatment.
      nid - Id of the nurse that did the treatment.

    • Treatment

      public Treatment(long tid, long pid, LocalDate date, LocalTime begin, LocalTime end, String description, String remarks, long nid, String status, LocalDate deletionDate, LocalDate archiveDate, String changedBy, String deletedBy)
      Constructor to initiate an object of class Treatment with the given parameter. Use this constructor to initiate objects, which are already persisted and have a treatment id (tid).
      Parameter:
      tid - Id of the treatment.
      pid - Id of the treated patient.
      date - Date of the Treatment.
      begin - Time of the start of the treatment in format "hh:MM"
      end - Time of the end of the treatment in format "hh:MM".
      description - Description of the treatment.
      remarks - Remarks to the treatment.
      nid - Id of the nurse that did the treatment

    • setNid

      public void setNid(long nid)
      Marks the treatment for future deletion by setting the archive date to the current date and the deletion date to 10 years from now. Optionally sets the status to inactive. This method is typically used for soft-deletion workflows.

    • markForDeletion

      public void markForDeletion()
